itunes:title: Episode 1121 - Nate Silver's Nightmare Scenario
title: Episode 1121 - Nate Silver's Nightmare Scenario
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
description:
Comedian David Lucas joins the show to talk about how not racist America actually is, what real racism actually looks like, why Pete Davidson's bang list isn't actually impressive, and the time he almost hooked up with Rihanna -- plus why he doesn't think John Mayer has a big penis.
